functions.name: CloseCurrentJob
functions.documentation: Close the current job - same as File - Close, if there are any unsaved changes user will be prompted to save before closing.

signature.label: CloseCurrentJob()
signature.documentation: Close the current job - same as File - Close, if there are any unsaved changes user will be prompted to save before closing.

functions.name: CreateNewJob
functions.detail: (name: string, bounds: Box2D, thickness: number, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean) → boolean
functions.documentation:
Creates a new job with passed name, and settings. Returns true if job created OK else false.

name - string - name for job (without extension)
bounds - Box2D - the 2d bounding box for the job area
thickness - double - thickness of material block
in_mm - bool - true if job is in mm, else in inches
origin_on_surface - true if z zero on material surface, else on machine bed

signature.label: CreateNewJob(name: string, bounds: Box2D, thickness: number, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean)
signature.documentation: Creates a new job with passed name, and settings. Returns true if job created OK else false.

functions.name: CreateNew2SidedJob
functions.detail: (name: string, bounds: Box2D, thickness: number, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean, flip_direction: SideFlipDirection) → boolean
functions.documentation:
Creates a new two sided job using the given parameters. Return true if the job was created, otherwise, false.

name - string - name for job (without extension)
bounds - Box2D - the 2d bounding box for the job area
thickness - double - thickness of material block
in_mm - bool - true if job is in mm, else in inches
origin_on_surface - true if z zero on material surface, else on machine bed
flip_direction – the axis around which we flip the job (VectricJob.AROUND_X or VectricJob.AROUND_Y)

signature.label: CreateNew2SidedJob(name: string, bounds: Box2D, thickness: number, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean, flip_direction: SideFlipDirection)
signature.documentation: Creates a new two sided job using the given parameters. Return true if the job was created, otherwise, false.

functions.name: CreateNewRotaryJob
functions.detail: (name: string, length: number, diameter: number, xy_origin: MaterialBlock.XYOrigin, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean, wrapped_along_x_axis: boolean) → boolean
functions.documentation:
Creates a new rotary job using the given parameters. Return true if the job was created, otherwise, false.

name - string - name for job (without extension)
length - double - the length of the material cylinder (Accessible from MaterialBlock.CylinderLength)
diameter – double – the diameter of the material cylinder (Accessible from MaterialBlock.CylinderDiameter)
xy_origin – MaterialBlock.XYOrigin – The XY origin of the block (Maps to the enum values of MaterialBlock.XYOrigin)
in_mm – bool – true if the job is in mm, else in inches
origin_on_surface – bool – true if z zero on material surface, else on machine bed
wrapped_along_x_axis – bool – true if we're wrapping along the X axis and wrapping the Y values (Accessible from MaterialBlock.RotationAxis)

signature.label: CreateNewRotaryJob(name: string, length: number, diameter: number, xy_origin: MaterialBlock.XYOrigin, in_mm: boolean, origin_on_surface: boolean, wrapped_along_x_axis: boolean)
signature.documentation: Creates a new rotary job using the given parameters. Return true if the job was created, otherwise, false.

functions.name: OpenExistingJob
functions.documentation:
Opens an existing CRV or CRV3D file. Returns true if file opened OK, else false

pathname - string - path to file

signature.label: OpenExistingJob(pathname: string)
signature.documentation: Opens an existing CRV or CRV3D file. Returns true if file opened OK, else false

functions.name: SaveCurrentJob
functions.documentation: Save the current job - same as File - Save, if no path has been set for the job this method will display the File Save As dialog.

signature.label: SaveCurrentJob()
signature.documentation: Save the current job - same as File - Save, if no path has been set for the job this method will display the File Save As dialog.
